text: My name is August. I’m a driven and creative individual who enjoys learning all kinds of new skills. I have a big interest in both hardware and software related areas. My personal hobbies include web development, movies and videogames. I see myself as resourceful when it comes to solving my newly encountered problems. Being determined to never give up is a core value of mine. The old saying “If you are gonna do something, do it right” is also something that I apply to everything I do.
